description: Approved Investors Only Join us for a VNTR Investor Luncheon - a curated gathering of active VC investors, family offices, business angels, and leading ecosystem players. We will discuss the latest trends and co-investment opportunities. AGENDA 14:00 - Arrival & Welcome 14:15 - Opening Dialogue By Yuri Rabinovich 14:25 - Luncheon & Peer Exchange 15:30 - Reflections & Signal Sharing 16:00 - Closing Note: Each guest is requested to cover their own expenses. WHAT TO EXPECT Enjoy networking with fellow investment decision-makers Get acquainted through discussions and private chats Learn
